definition: to take sb's measurements/to measure sb up
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Tailor your presentations; don't be generic.
sentences.chinese: 量身訂做你的自我陳述，不要大衆化。

sentences.english: Each of our instanced dungeons is tailor made for one level range.
sentences.chinese: 我們的每個要塞場景都是按照各等級量身定做的。

sentences.english: BV could design inhouse training according to your requirements.
sentences.chinese: 公司也可以根據客戶需求，量身制定內部培訓。

sentences.english: This is an application that is made for mobile.
sentences.chinese: 這個應用程序就是爲移動量身定做的。

sentences.english: Let us can offer the high quality product and service with your compa…
sentences.chinese: 讓我們能爲貴公司提供量身訂做的優質產品。

sentences.english: In the town, qinghe County, Hebei province, conduct tailored business enterprise more and more.
sentences.chinese: 在河北省清河縣，開展量身定做業務的企業越來越多。

sentences.english: If even that fails to accommodate you, the company will tailor-make one.
sentences.chinese: 如果你穿着還嫌小，公司還可以爲你量身定做。

sentences.english: Machine specification also can be designed by optional requirement of the users.
sentences.chinese: 機械亦可依使用者工作條件量身訂作。

sentences.english: Each of our programs is at your tailored to the different requirements.
sentences.chinese: 我們的每項方案都是應您的不同要求而量身定製。
量身定做一個桌面背景。

sentences.english: MEASURE】The tailor measured me for a new suit of clothes.
sentences.chinese: 裁縫爲我量身做一套新衣服。

sentences.english: Danyang Zhao but perhaps he can be tailored to Balao wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 但趙丹陽或許可以得到巴老爲他量身定做的至理名言。

sentences.english: Bucket size and other characteristics can be tailor-made to suit individual customer's requirements.
sentences.chinese: 剷鬥尺寸和其它特性可以根據用戶要求量身定製。

sentences.english: Lipper DataFeed Services - Customize Lipper data to meet your company's research and reporting needs.
sentences.chinese: 爲客戶量身定做的裏浦數據滿足貴司的研究報告需要。

sentences.english: We will decorate an elegant world for you whatever you like.
sentences.chinese: 成功爲您量身定造一個品味高雅的藝術世界。

sentences.english: Prosthestist, Bill Dykes says each of these prostheses are individually made for each patient.
sentences.chinese: 義肢師父比爾說，義肢都是爲每個人量身訂做的。

definition: lit. measure the body then tailor the suit (idiom); fig. to act according to actual circumstances/To live within one's means.
custom-made/made-to-order/to have something custom made/also written 定製|定制
to belong or be dedicated exclusively to/proprietary/private/personal
to put one's heart (and soul) into sth/with great care
